label: 倶舎
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: [T]he verses that served as points of departure for the arguments in Vasubandhu's Treasury of the Higher Subtleties (Kusharon), the basic scripture for the Kusha sect (p. 579n). [倶舎論]
